projects.name: GoSafe: Safe Route Recommendation App
projects.description: Developed a mobile application that dynamically recommends the safest routes by analyzing real-time crime data from Firestore. Integrated OSRM API for geocoding.

projects.name: AI based merchant application
projects.description: AI based merchant application that will give recommendations on the basis of stock and seasonal changes.

projects.name: Laptop Price Prediction Model
projects.description: In-depth analysis of feature distributions along with feature engineering. Random forest algorithm used to train data. Web interface using Streamlit.
